block.p: MAJOR LEAGUE BASEBALL--Suspended Pittsburgh Pirates pitching coach Pete Vuckovich for three games and fined him an undisclosed amount for his actions during a game against the New York Mets on June 23.

MAJOR LEAGUE BASEBALL--Suspended Pittsburgh Pirates pitching coach Pete Vuckovich for three games and fined him an undisclosed amount for his actions during a game against the New York Mets on June 23.
American League NEW YORK YANKEES--Optioned INF Clay Bellinger to Columbus of the International League. Called up LHP Ed Yarnall from Columbus.

National League MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Optioned RHP Allen Levrault to Indianapolis of the International League. Recalled LHP Ray King from Indianapolis. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Agreed to terms with LHP Sean Burnett and RHP David Beigh.
Women's National Basketball Association CLEVELAND ROCKERS--Placed F Eva Nemcova on the injured list. Signed F Adia Barnes to a seven-day contract.

National Hockey League ATLANTA THRASHERS--Announced the resignation of Les Jackson, assistant general manager. BUFFALO SABRES--Named Brian McCutcheon assistant coach. CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS--Claimed C Mark Janssens off waivers from the Philadelphia Flyers. DALLAS STARS--Named Les Jackson director of hockey operations. LOS ANGELES KINGS--Signed LW Stu Grimson to a one-year contract. MINNESOTA WILD--Signed C Brian Bonin. PHILADELPHIA FLYERS--Re-signed W Rick Tocchet to a two-year contract.

COLLEGIATE TRACK CONFERENCE--Named Mark Griffin president, Jim Barber vice president and Christian Morrison treasurer. Announced the retirement of Bill Omeltchenko, treasurer. ALABAMA STATE--Announced the resignation of Kevin Manns, sports information director, to take the same position at Southern University. ALBANY, N.Y.--Named Lee McElroy Jr. director of athletics and recreation. ALMA--Announced the resignation of Margo Greicar, athletic trainer, to accept a position as program director and assistant professor at Heidelberg College. ASHLAND--Named Paul Graham swimming coach. BOWLING GREEN--Named Scott Kellar strength and conditioning coach. FLORIDA STATE--Announced the resignation of Ernie Lanford, men's golf coach. ILLINOIS STATE--Named Tina Kramos assistant softball coach. LOUISIANA TECH--Named Katie Cochran women's basketball administrative assistant. MIAMI--Named Perry Clark men's basketball coach.
